examples: it is none of your affair

definitions.text: some situation or event that is thought about
examples: he kept drifting off the topic
he had been thinking about the subject for several years
it is a matter for the police

definitions.text: that which has mass and occupies space
examples: physicists study both the nature of matter and the forces which govern it
they were friends and it was no matter who won the games

definitions.text: written works (especially in books or magazines)
examples: he always took some reading matter with him on the plane

definitions.text: have weight; have import, carry weight
